argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_shss | |- ( A e. SH -> A C_ ~H ) |
| 2 |  | #P_shss | |- ( B e. SH -> B C_ ~H ) |
| 3 |  | #P_sshjval | |- ( ( A C_ ~H /\ B C_ ~H ) -> ( A vH B ) = ( _|_ ` ( _|_ ` ( A u. B ) ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. SH /\ B e. SH ) -> ( A vH B ) = ( _|_ ` ( _|_ ` ( A u. B ) ) ) ) |
